activities:
Stuzo is in the business of providing custom web development services for businesses.  We are not applying on behalf of these customers or for any of our client projects and our privacy policy and this letter is certification for our corporate website Stuzo.com.

How we collect personal information is listed in our privacy and specifically to the EU and Switzerland is related to the following:

Stuzo may collect personally identifiable information, such as your name. Stuzo may also collect anonymous demographic information, which is not unique to you, such as your age and gender. We may gather additional personal or non-personal information in the future.

Information about your computer hardware and software may be automatically collected by Stuzo. This information can include: your IP address, browser type, domain names, access times and referring website addresses. This information is used for the operation of the service, to maintain quality of the service, and to provide general statistics regarding use of the Stuzo website.

Stuzo collects and uses your personal information to operate its website(s) and deliver the services you have requested.

Stuzo does not sell, rent or lease its customer lists to third parties.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client, customer data including manually processed data
